evidence.text: A. Declare that Defendants have unreasonably delayed or unlawfully withheld agency action or actions, including application of statutorily‑mandated formulas to Congressional appropriations for grant terminations ostensibly “rescinded”; 5 U.S.C. § 706(1);
evidence.source_document: Amended Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: A. Declare that Defendants have unreasonably delayed or unlawfully withheld agency action or actions, including application of statutorily‑mandated formulas to Congressional appropriations for grant terminations ostensibly “rescinded”; 5 U.S.C. § 706(1);

evidence.text: B. Declare the blanket termination and/or terminations arbitrary and capricious and not in accordance with law. 5 USC 706(2).
evidence.source_document: Amended Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: B. Declare the blanket termination and/or terminations arbitrary and capricious and not in accordance with law. 5 USC 706(2).

evidence.text: F. Enjoin Defendants from enforcing or giving effect to their decisions to eliminate the Fed/State Office at NEH, to shut down processing of all open grants to state and jurisdictional humanities councils, and to delay or refuse to spend the funds appropriated to NEH by Congress.
evidence.source_document: Amended Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: F. Enjoin Defendants from enforcing or giving effect to their decisions to eliminate the Fed/State Office at NEH, to shut down processing of all open grants to state and jurisdictional humanities councils, and to delay or refuse to spend the funds appropriated to NEH by Congress.

evidence.text: G. Enjoin Defendants from enforcing termination notices of the Federation’s grants and its members’ grants.
evidence.source_document: Amended Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: G. Enjoin Defendants from enforcing termination notices of the Federation’s grants and its members’ grants.

evidence.text: H. Enjoin Defendants to obligate and spend the full amount of funds that Congress has appropriated to the Federal State partnership at NEH without intentional delay.
evidence.source_document: Amended Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief

add_extracted.value: H. Enjoin Defendants to obligate and spend the full amount of funds that Congress has appropriated to the Federal State partnership at NEH without intentional delay.
